title: Can I Play Fortnite Online Without Live or Game Pass?

steps.title: You don't need Xbox Live to play Fortnite.
steps.content: You don't need Xbox Live to play Fortnite. In the past, you needed a subscription for Xbox Live to play online with friends . Fortnite remains a free-to-play game (with paid features), so you don't need to worry about a subscription. Additionally, PlayStation players don't need a PlayStation Plus subscription to play Fortnite . You'll still need to sign up for an Epic Games account to keep your progress and enable cross-play.

steps.title: Open the Microsoft Store.
steps.content: Open the Microsoft Store. You can find this in the My Games & apps tile on the home screen. Be sure to select the Apps section. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select Search.
steps.content: Select Search . You can use the menu on the left or the search bar at the top of the page.

steps.title: Enter fortnite and search.
steps.content: Enter fortnite and search. It will load in the results.

steps.title: Select Install.
steps.content: Select Install . Fortnite will begin installing . You can see the progress in the Quick Menu underneath Manage .

steps.title: Log into your Epic Games account.
steps.content: Log into your Epic Games account. Enter your email address and password for your Epic Games account. Once you're logged in, you can begin playing.
